title: What are some important lessons that you are taking into 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Don’t see what is obvious, remove the veil and unearth the reason. Her office timing was 10 to 8 but she used to come at 9 and leave at 7. She worked well but her other colleagues got irked due to her exit timing. Her boss did not have any problem with her timing but one day, a rumour spread that she comes early so as to steal data from the office and supplying to the competitor. Her boss called her and asked her the reason. She said that her father was at the last stage of cancer and undergoing the treatment at the hospital located near to their office. His chemo time is from 7 to 9 in the morning and 7 to 9 in the evening. To save her time, she used to come office early and leave early. But no one tried to look what was lying behind her life. Everyone sees what they have to see.

The Earlier You Can Get Up the Better. It’s Only When Everyone is Still Asleep and/or Not Around that You are TRULY Alone with You, Your Thoughts, Dreams, & Aspirations. Please let me know if You Need Further Help. I’m Devoted to Mindset. It’s EVERYTHING! All the Best, Chaz Your Digital Mindset | Build Your Business
